subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Any eBay sellers willing to do this?
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1207608804
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Once the modification info hit the internet and youtube it basically became  
public domain.  Steve has also put up how-to video's before.  All the  
information us out there and all we have to do is direct the curious minds to  the 
proper locations.
 
 
In a message dated 4/7/2008 5:50:53 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
ITCdeadpeople@... writes:

 
 
 
I think Jeff's idea is a good one. Post links to UFOGEEK (with permission,  
of course), 
YouTube videos, this Yahoo forum, etc.  

Margaret

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
"psfponies" <psfponies@.ps> wrote:
>
> I am open to any  ideas. I am just trying to figure out the best way 
> to list just the  hack information.
> 
> Kay
> 
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
"itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@> 
> wrote:
>  >
> > Hi Kay. I think it should be a brief description on how to  do all 
> the hacks.
> > 
> > 12-469 old
> >  12-469 current
> > 12-470 old
> > 12-820 current
>  > 20-125 current
> > 
> > Did I miss any? For a $1  listing fee, and no hassles of buying 
> product in advance then  
> > having to ship, that would be totally worth it. Unlimited  
> downloads (for how long can you 
> > list - 9 days?) would  reach a heck of a lot more people than 
> selling units at cost.  :-)
> > 
> > Margaret
> > 
> > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
"psfponies" <psfponies@> wrote:
> > >
> > > opps  I mean:
> > > 
> > > Can someone send me the written  instructions on how to hack the 
> 12-
> > > 469!!
>  > > 
> > > Kay
> > > 
> > > 
>  > > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
"psfponies" <psfponies@> wrote:
> > > >
> > >  > I checked to see what it would cost to sell one of ebay. To 
> list  
> > > it 
> > > > it is $1.00 for $25.00-449.00  plus 8.75% of the initial $25.00 
> > > > ($2.19), plus 3.50%  of the remaining closing value balance 
> ($25.01 
> > >  > to $1,000.00)
> > > > 
> > > > 
>  > > > I would be willing to list the one I have plus give the  
> > > information 
> > > > on the free hacking and  that fact that you can get one at 
> Radio 
> > > > Shack  for $24.99 just to shut this guy down. At the most I 
> would 
>  > > be 
> > > > out $1.00 to not sell it!!!! Well worth  it I'd say.
> > > > 
> > > > Can someone send me  the written instructions on how to hack 
> the 12-
> > >  > 249.
> > > > 
> > > > Kay
> > >  > 
> > > > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , 
"LC  Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> > > > >
> > >  > > Either that, or anyone willing to make them for $25 + 
>  shipping 
> > > > with 
> > > > > no profit?  You could then list them just like the ones that 
> are 
> >  > > > selling...so they pull up identical to the listings that are  
> up 
> > > > > there. :)
> > > > >  
> > > > > LC
> > > > > 
> > >  > > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) 
,  "itcdeadpeople" 
> <ITCdeadpeople@> 
> > > >  > wrote:
> > > > > >
> > > > > >  I was thinking if someone would list a FREE DOWNLOAD of 
> > >  > > instructions for the various hacks 
> > > > > >  on the Radio Shack units, it could put an end to the 
> business  
> > > > for 
> > > > > sellers that are  taking 
> > > > > > advantage of people who are unaware  that they could 
> probably 
> > > > hack 
> >  > > > the units for 
> > > > > > themselves.  
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > I have  seen "downloads" of various things listed before. 
> Why 
> >  > > not 
> > > > > this?
> > > > >  > 
> > > > > > Margaret
> > > > >  >
> > > > >
> > > >
> >  >
>  >
>
